subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: All the preseason doomsaying was forgotten, at least on Monday, as the Mets broke out their bats and walloped the San Diego Padres behind the pitching of Jon Niese.
snippet: All the preseason doomsaying was forgotten, at least on Monday, as the Mets broke out their bats and walloped the San Diego Padres behind the pitching of Jon Niese.
